Waste Management in Retail Operations


Challenge

Waste Management is one of the most prominent problems affecting sustainability objectives of major retailers. As UN Sustainable Development Goals are gradually becoming a part of doing business, the corporate sustainability team required a digital learning solution that teaches recycling best practices to store personnel to reduce recycling costs and waste.

Upon viewing the eCommerce training, the sustainability team asked me to use virtual instructor Kurie to deliver recycling best practices to retail staff.


Solution

I designed and developed a game-like UI interface that walked learners through various learning episodes and videos on recycling best practices. New animation techniques that capture the learners' attention were also implemented.


Technologies Used

Character Animator, After Effects, Audition, Photoshop, Illustrator, Storyline, JavaScript
